vclaim: On April 26, 2021, Fox News host Tucker Carlson said forcing children to wear masks outside is akin to “child abuse” and people “are morally obligated to attempt to prevent it."
title: Did Tucker Carlson Say Forcing Kids To Wear Masks Outside Is ‘Child Abuse’?
subtitle: The Fox News host has also said seeing a vaccinated person wearing a mask outside is like watching a man “expose himself in public.”
author: Nur Ibrahim
